response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $12,000 by you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $11,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive rate, tailored specifically for discerning clients like yourself. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you better.", "product_price": 11000}
